short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add gifts to your wedding registry from anywhere on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reggie - Wedding gifts, without a hitch 💕

Streamline your registry creation with the 'Reggie Gift Extension' which allows you to grab product details from anywhere on the internet. It's as easy as 1, 2, 3: 

1️⃣ Navigate to page of a product you wan, open the Reggie Gift Extension from the top right of Chrome and click "Get product". 

2️⃣ The Reggie Gift Extension will pull the all the key product details from the product's page and give you an opportunity to make some final adjustments. 

3️⃣ When you're happy, click "Add Gift" and viola, your product will be sent instantly to your growing wedding registry.

That's all there is to it!  🎉

And don't panic, once the product is on your registry you can still edit it further from your dashboard.

Don't have a registry yet? Get started here --> we.lovereggie.com/register
